name: Piranha's bounty
description:
2 guys, 2 nights, 1 game.

There it is ladies and gentleman,

The newest addition in your Piranha games collection.

Piranha's bounty coming to ich.io near YOU.

Controls:

Left/Right - Movement

UP - Jump/Swim up

Space bar - Using weapons

Mouse - buy items from shop, you can select already bought items to switch to them

Esc - Escape menu

Heal at the SHOP!

The deeper you go, the better fish!

Ps: You better have some fun
